title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 21 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Dec 21 2021
description:
Buck shares his first experience hosting for Rush and the cold that almost killed his big showbiz break.

How covid rules hurt kids (versus protect them) and Buck's own struggle with a childhood speech impediment.

Revisiting Rush's words about Buck and the conservative media mothership.

Arizona Senate candidate Blake Masters on fighting corruption.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
